name: Environaut\Config\IConfigHandler
short_desc: Default interface all Environaut config handlers must implement.

getConfig.name: getConfig
getConfig.short_desc: Returns the currently (read and merged) config data as a concrete IConfig implementating class.

addLocation.name: addLocation
addLocation.short_desc: Adds the given location to the set of locations to check for configs.
exceptions: if given location is not readable

location.name: location
location.short_desc: location to check for config files (usually a file/directory path)

setLocations.name: setLocations
setLocations.short_desc: Set the locations to check for config files.

getLocations.name: getLocations
getLocations.hint_desc: of locations used for config file lookups
